name: The Cradle of Ruin
storyline: Hotarou lives in a white shelter together with four females. They never doubt the happiness in their daily life, but it suddenly comes to the end one day. The first but the most difficult choice lies in front of him, he have to do something to escape from the circling and repeating tragedy before the whole world is destroyed.
